description.value:
When you learn this ability, the following Mantras are added to your list of available Mantras to choose from.  However, these Mantras can only be associated with your Number of Nature.  

In addition, when this is unlocked, you can swap out 1 Mantra you know for another one.  

  • Paths Less Traveled: You gain an additional 10 feet of movement on either your current or next turn.
  • The Land Heals in Time: You regain 1 hit point.
